> I have never on any project ever tested whether close() closes a
> database connection. By a show of hands, how many people have tested that?

Nope. Never done that.

And I've already mentioned that any problems with third party database
drivers _will_ show up in integration, funtional, performance or load
testing. Thay always have for me.
